definition: meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130

sentences.english: You'll never get the bacon grease off the plates if you don't use detergent.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不使用去垢剂你永远不能除去熏猪肉的油脂。

sentences.english: Daeji Gal-bi is the choice pork ribs specially hand filleted, marinated in the sweet soy sauce.
sentences.chinese: 腌制在甜酱油里的猪肉，吃起来又有另一番风味。

sentences.english: Sweet and Sour Pork with Steamed Rice and Asian Vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 青菜炒粗面配蒸猪肉饺。

sentences.english: in the cork workshop, the workers fork the pork.
sentences.chinese: 在栓皮厂房，工许多人用叉子叉猪肉。

sentences.english: I've ordered savory pork and cole slaw.
sentences.chinese: 我点了咸猪肉和凉拌生菜丝。
九龙旺角区菜市场猪肉摊。

sentences.english: The local dishes are robust and challenging, featuring mainly pork.
sentences.chinese: 地方菜口味浓重，令人回味无穷，以猪肉主料为特色。

sentences.english: Then I'll have the pork cutlet instead.
sentences.chinese: 那么，我要猪肉片来代替。

sentences.english: My sister's favourite food is pork and vegetable dumpling.
sentences.chinese: 我妹妹最喜欢的食物是猪肉菜饺。

sentences.english: I like dumplings with vegetables and pork better than any other kind.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜欢蔬菜和猪肉馅的饺子。

sentences.english: Of course, in the Jewish tradition, borscht is never made with pork.
sentences.chinese: 当然，在犹太人的传统中，罗宋汤是从来不放猪肉的。

sentences.english: This dish is made of hog meat, have a try!
sentences.chinese: 这道菜是阉猪肉做的，你尝尝鲜。

sentences.english: The pork pie likely originated as a snack for hunting parties.
sentences.chinese: 猪肉馅饼很可能起源于狩猎会上的一道点心。

sentences.english: Sweet and sour pork is one of the classic foods in Cantonese cuisine.
sentences.chinese: 咕噜肉是粤菜中的经典菜肴，以甜酸汁和猪肉煮成。

sentences.english: The pork glowed in the dark but returned to 'normal' in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 这块猪肉在晚上闪着蓝光，而白天却又恢复正常。
